article.title: 10 Best Things To Do On The Gold Coast At Night
article.lead_paragraph:
Not sure what there is to do when the sun sets on the "Sunshine State"? Read on to find out about the top things to do on the Gold Coast, Queensland at night.

Home to Surfers Paradise, the Gold Coast is famous for its beaches and activities in the sun. However, there exists a myriad of other things to do. There's no need to retire to your hotels when there are numerous things to do on the Gold Coast at night; from activities for the whole family, to games where you can pit your skills against each other, there's something for everyone even at night.
article.proposal:
Does the night energy entice you? Do you enjoy seeing what the night brings out in a place? Would you like to know what the Gold Coast has to offer at night? Well, read on: 
1. No bedtime for kids: There is a lot of fun stuff for kids to do at night at the Gold Coast and they are not expecting you to ask them to go to bed early, it is a vacation after all. Get them umped at Putt Putt Golf at Mermaid Beach, go to Timezone and have all the fun activities under one roof and have them get in touch with their artistic side at The Art Center. 
2. Competitive edge at night: Whether you are with family or friends, put on your game face and compete at the Racecenter, Slideways or get some adrenaline pumping at the Sling Shot Park. 
3. Nature at night: If you are one with nature, you can go and have a Glow Worm Tour, 
4. Night markets: If shopping during the day was not enough, how about savoring the best of the night market and enjoy the energetic feeling of nighttime activities at the Miami Marketta Street Food, Nightquarter Markets or at the Surfers Paradise Beachfront Markets. 
5. Drink, dance and be merry: The Gold Coast has the best bars and nightclubs for an evening full of laughter, dancing and all round fun. There are many to list but if I had to, check out 1 Two 3 Lounge Bar, Sin City and East 88.
article.meta_description: Does the night energy entice you? Do you enjoy seeing what the night brings out in a place? Would you like to know what the Gold Coast has to offer at night?

snippets.title: No bedtime for kids
snippets.description: On holiday and insisting on the kids go to bed early? Considering it's a vacation, below is some of the best things to do in the Gold Coast with kids at night:

snippets.title: 1. Sink holes at Putt Putt Golf, Mermaid Beach
snippets.title_with_numbering: 1. Sink holes at Putt Putt Golf, Mermaid Beach
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/twhnYfH-sE/?taken-by=putt_putt_golf

You can spend some quality bonding time at the Putt Putt golf course making your way through 18 holes with your kids. Take it nice and slow, and before you know it, it's close time at 10:00pm and you are all ready to hit the sack. 
> #### Putt Putt Golf at Mermaid Beach
>
> **Address**:  2492 Gold Coast Hwy, Mermaid Beach - Gold Coast QLD 4218, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Putt Putt Golf](https://www.puttputtgolf.com.au/)

snippets.title: 2. Fun activities under one roof at Timezone
snippets.title_with_numbering: 2. Fun activities under one roof at Timezone
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BTTCUBVA3vW/?taken-at=321003
Watch your kids lose it when you walk into Timezone, a gamer’s mecca. They have gaming machines, air hockey, putt putt and laser skirmish, which will have them occupied for a good amount of time. For even more fun, join them and enjoy the bonding time you will have. 
> #### Timezone
>
> **Address**:  Cavill Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Timezone](http://www.timezonegoldcoast.com.au/)

snippets.title: Competitive edge at night
snippets.description: Put on your game face and get ready to demolish records at the following competitive centers:

embed.value: Put on your game face and get ready to demolish records at the following competitive centers:

snippets.title: 4. Racecenter
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/racecentre/photos/a.363249570397553.89395.150989748290204/1283724765016691/?type=3&theater
With the most advanced racing simulation technology, you will have the most fun with your group of friends or with your family as you vie for the top position for the best virtual racing winner. Feel like Vettel or Hamilton as you race in their real-time, professional simulators. Do not be surprised if Hamilton or Vettel walk in for some driving sessions with you, the race drivers are known to stroll in for a session or two. Have a realistic racing experience on the best racing tracks in the world. Choose from a variety of cars like Lamborghini, Drift, GT3 and of course a Ferrari. They are so on demand that they have opened other centers in South Wales, Darling Harbor and Slideways Karting Brisbane. 
> #### Racecenter
>
> **Address**:  (within Strike Bowling Bar), 9 Ferny Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Racecenter](http://www.racecentre.com/)

snippets.title: 5. Knock down some pins at AMF Bowling
snippets.title_with_numbering: 5. Knock down some pins at AMF Bowling
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BWmqoooA8nW/?hl=en&taken-at=1383740434973439

With closing hours at midnight on Satudays (10pm on Sunday to Wednesday, 10.30pm on Thursday and 11.30pm on Friday), have a ball of a time at the AMF Bowling center. If you are tired of bowling over your competition, you can also engage in a friendly round of laser tag or just take it easy at the arcade. This place is perfect for a night of fun and activities for groups!

> #### AMF Bowling Robina
>
> **Address**:  Robina Town Centre Robina QLD, 4230
>
> **Website**: [AMF Bowling Robina](https://www.amfbowling.com.au/venues/qld/amf-robina)

snippets.title: 6. Sling Shot Park
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/SlingShotVomatronGoldCoast/photos/a.478099008886247.125812.478062168889931/1254446521251488/?type=3&theater
Taking the mechanism of the little sling shot toy, this park will catapult you vertically at breakneck speed up in the sky. The exhilarating part is usually the anticipation of it and when you are released, you enjoy the tranquility of it all as you soar up in the sky. 
> #### Sling Shot Park
>
> **Address**: 6 Palm Ave, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Sling Shot Park](http://www.funtime.com.au/data/index1.htm)

snippets.title: Night markets
snippets.description: There is something about night markets that is always so endearing. I do not know whether it is the street foods on offer, the bargaining prices or just the energetic feeling all around. You should not miss these markets in the Gold Coast:

embed.value: There is something about night markets that is always so endearing. I do not know whether it is the street foods on offer, the bargaining prices or just the energetic feeling all around. You should not miss these markets in the Gold Coast:

snippets.title: 7. Miami Marketta Street Food
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BTN_YrShEz2/?taken-at=98921722
This is a trendy event that always has great and exciting turnouts as people mill around the grounds tasting and savoring the street foods on offer. The market does not lack anything, enjoy the coffee at the permanently located café Rabbit Radio, tickle your arty mind at the many art spaces in the area and dance away at the concerts that are usually held there. Food, music and great energy all around, what else can one ask for? 
> #### Miami Marketta Street Food
>
> **Address**:  23 Hillcrest Parade, Miami QLD 4221, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Miami Marketta Street Food](http://www.miamimarketta.com/)

embed.value_html: OEmbed fetch flag has been disabled, enable it for HTML

snippets.title: 8. NightQuarter Markets
snippets.description:
https://www.facebook.com/nightquarter/photos/a.1407592629535113.1073741827.1405608969733479/1519285291699179/?type=1&theater
Night markets always come with a whole bag of tricks and the NightQuarter is no exception. Known for its festive vibe, enter a world of live music, street food, market stalls and shipping container boutiques blanketed with stringed lights. The energy is transferrable which will have you beaming as you move from one stall to another while chewing on delicious street food. There are six bars at the market, so if you opt to enjoy a drink while people watching, then you are welcome in one of them as they serve you cocktails, wine, or craft beer. All the activities are going on with background music from best Gold Coast emerging musicians and touring acts. Everything for your senses in one place. 
> #### NightQuarter Markets
>
> **Address**:  1 Town Centre Dr, Helensvale QLD 4212, Australia
>
> **Website**: [NightQuarter Markets](http://nightquarter.com.au/)

snippets.title: 9. Surfers Paradise Beachfront Markets
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BS60-D6lvTq/?taken-at=222566856
Enjoy some retail therapy after dark at Surfers Paradise Beachfront Market. Find great bargains and collectables at great prices. This market is characterized by colorful stalls that offer you the best of locally produced arts and crafts, fashion, jewelry, homewares and health and beauty products made from natural ingredients. Have your fortune told by the fortune tellers on site, get dazzled by the many magicians and have wholesome entertainment from the performers on site. This is where you can get a one-of-a-kind gift for someone. Recharge in one of the many cafés and restaurants on site before continuing with your shopping experience. 
> #### Surfers Paradise Beachfront Markets
>
> **Address**:  Esplanade, Surfers Paradise QLD 4217, Australia
>
> **Website**: [Surfers Paradise Beachfront Markets](http://www.surfersparadise.com/things-to-do/beachfront-markets)

snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BSnrYOgFkQa/?taken-at=2250340
A lounge at the Gold Coast that serves you starters, entrées, main courses and topped off with dessert! 1 two 3 is a marvel on its own that goes out of the way to make its patrons happy. Or for a great club scene, don't miss SinCity Nightclub and East 88 for a great night on the dance floor.

> #### 1 two 3 Lounge Bar
>
> **Address**:  Shop 10 & 11 Phoenician Tower East Surf Pde, Broadbeach QLD 4218, Australia
>

>

> #### East 88

article.keyword: things to do in the gold coast at night

lead_paragraph_embed.value:
Not sure what there is to do when the sun sets on the "Sunshine State"? Read on to find out about the top things to do on the Gold Coast, Queensland at night.

Home to Surfers Paradise, the Gold Coast is famous for its beaches and activities in the sun. However, there exists a myriad of other things to do. There's no need to retire to your hotels when there are numerous things to do on the Gold Coast at night; from activities for the whole family, to games where you can pit your skills against each other, there's something for everyone even at night.

article.guidelines:
##### 1. For listings WITH partner links (getyourguide / viator / klook): 

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: Not required*

Snippets: Not required*

*Ensure the tour link is copy/pasted in the partner link field for each section


##### 2. For listings WITHOUT partner links:

Category: Things to do 

Tags: things to do

Paragraph Headings: 

- Create a creative and catchy heading for the activity. 

- Example: "North-end Boston secret food tour" should be changed to something like "Indulge in some delicious local fare".

Photos: 
- Include relevant royalty-free / social media photos

- Upload 1 relevant royalty-free image (non-social media image) in the conclusion paragraph to use as the article's main image (ONLY if all listings have social media images)

- Refer to this tutorial guide: http://bit.ly/imagetutorialguide

Snippets: 

- Insert the "Things to do / Tours / Attractions" snippet manually at the end of each listing's paragraph and edit the information accordingly.

navigator.introduction: Experienced and accomplished freelance writer seeking new writing challenges!. I have experience in freelance copywriting spanning over 6 years, producing everything from web content, Ebooks and marketing copy for small businesses to SEO content articles across a wide range of subjects.
